system.description:
If you possess the Sacred Aura or Improved Sacred Aura abilities, the radius of those auras is equal to your Commanding Presence aura. If you do not possess either ability, you may spend 4 exertion points to gain the benefit of one aura from the Sacred Aura herald ability. This aura lasts until you finish a short or long rest.

The radius of your Commanding Presence increases by 10 feet.
